column5: Start Date: OctoberDesigned for those without a psychology background, this online MSc Psychology degree encourages you to explore this fascinating subject and pursue careers related to the field. The online and part-time nature of the MSc Psychology course allows you to study around your existing work and family commitments while gaining a solid grounding in a range of psychology topics.
column7: £11,836 UK and International (2022-23) £12,167 UK / £12,428 International (2023-24)  Our course fees are fully inclusive – all teaching materials and required reading are included, and there are no hidden charges for assessments or resits.
